text: Honor Kneafsey (born 2004) is a British actress. In 2014, Kneafsey played June Mottershead in the BBC1 drama Our Zoo. She has made numerous television, film and West End stage appearances. == Filmography == === Film === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
